long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Welcome to Wonder Formula, the wonderful Salesforce Formula editor that streamlines your formula crafting experience. With powerful features such as syntax highlighting, autocomplete, and formatting, this tool simplifies the creation of intricate formulas.

When visiting a Salesforce formula page, Wonder Formula seamlessly adds a dedicated tab, 'Wonder Formula ðŸª„'. A simple click reveals the editor while maintaining synchronization with vanilla Salesforce editors.

Key Editor Features:
- Autocompletion for fields and functions
- Formatting for enhanced readability
- Automatic validation for error-free formulas
- Review changes via a convenient diff mode
- Code folding for improved organization
- Parentheses matching for precise editing

Your feedback matters! Use the editor to send suggestions, shaping the best Salesforce Formula editor together. 

Check out the video for a quick demo!
